instructions: In a mixing bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Drain oranges, reserving the juice; set oranges aside. Stir juice into gelatin. Add cream cheese; beat until smooth. Stir in sherbet and whipped topping. Pour into a 6-cup ring mold coated with nonstick cooking spray. Top with oranges. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
title: Layered Orange Gelatin
